name: Pretty Comments
author: Andrea Belvedere

sections.description:
Add some formatting capabilities to the comments textareas.

Bug Fixes

Non yet, but please report any on http://www.andreabelvedere.com/opensource/pretty-comments

Notes

This plug-in does not have any settings, simply activate it or deactivate it from the “Plugins’ menu of WordPress

Credits for the jQuery plug-in go to the authors of jWYSIWYG (http://code.google.com/p/jwysiwyg/)
sections.installation:
1. Upload pretty-comments to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
